page.title: 17Hospitals in Ryhope
page.content: There are two{hospitals}in Ryhope which serve the community.{Cherry {Knowle Hospital}cares for those who are mentally ill and{Ryhope General {Hospital}looks after those who are physically ill. { Ryhope General Hospital,}built in 1941, was originally a military hospital which treated the soldiers who were injured at Dunkirk. The original buildings are still part of the hospital. { Cherry Knowle Hospital}was built in 1895 'to house pauper lunatics'. During the last war the number of patients increased dramatically. Today {Cherry Knowle Hospital}is regarded as a progressive and forward looking centre for the treatment of psychiatric illnesses. It is a community hospital catering only for the people of{Sunderland.
